lines.text:
[Graham is buying fish]
You want any shark as well?

[Remembering his mistake]
No, no shark at all!

[They are out hunting whale sharks]
I thought you said it wasn't dangerous!
Well, it has teeth. That's what they said in the book.

[On a train]
Come, steady now, Mij.

[about her dog's devotion to Mij]
I don't think he realizes he's a dog!

[Trapped on roof of his cottage after Mij knocks ladder over]
What an idiot I am!

[Horrified at his mistake]
I-I thought it was just an otter!
It could have broken your arm!
Yes, but the cygnet was caught in the wire, you see.
